tagline: Your premier destination for comfortable dormitory stays and versatile hall rentals in Oromia. Book your space today!
searchDormitories: Search by room number or floor...

selectDateRangePrompt: Select a date range to see available dormitories for your desired period.

fillFormToBookDormitory: Fill out the form below to request your dormitory booking.

selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both a start and end date for your booking.
errorCheckingAvailability: Error checking availability. Please try again or contact support.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
facilityNotAvailableAdminOverride: {itemName} is currently set as unavailable by administration.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Item {itemName} could not be found in our records.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: Dormitory capacity is not properly configured. Please contact support.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Room {roomName} does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
dateRangeRequired: Date range with start and end dates is required.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: An error occurred while calculating the total cost. Please check your inputs.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate the price. Item pricing information is missing.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed. Please complete payment as per instructions.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. You will be notified once it's processed.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking request. Please try again.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. You can find the details below.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: Your booking is received! Please submit your payment proof via Telegram for verification. Details are below.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your booking request for our facility. We will review it and get back to you soon regarding approval.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please try again or contact support.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason. After payment, please send a screenshot of your transfer confirmation to our Telegram bot.
paymentReferenceNoteConfirmationPage: Use Booking ID ({bookingId}) as payment reference. Send proof to our Telegram bot.
goToAtOroedubotButton: Send Payment Proof to Telegram Bot
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please use the bank details below to complete your payment. After payment, submit proof via our Telegram bot.
telegramProofSubmissionInstruction: After making the payment, please send a screenshot of your transaction confirmation to our Telegram bot: {botUsername}. Mention your phone number ({phoneNumber}) and Booking ID when you send the proof.
afterSendingProofAdminWillVerify: After sending proof, our admin will verify your payment and confirm your booking.
paymentNotExpectedOrAlreadyProcessed: Payment is not expected for this booking or has already been processed.
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to view dormitories available during that period.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: Sorry, no dormitories are available for the selected date range. Please try different dates.
checkingAvailabilityForRange: Checking availability for the selected range...
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory bookings using your phone number.

noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.

noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings found. Once users make bookings, they will appear here.

searchDormitoryBookings: Search by ID, name, phone, etc.

enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
individualUserNote: Individual users can book dormitories without registration.
networkRequestFailedError: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
userDataMissingError: User data could not be loaded. Please try logging out and in again. If the issue persists, contact support.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book our facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval by our admin team. You will be notified via email once approved.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: Failed to logout. Please try again.
searchCompanies: Search by company name, contact, or email...
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and approve or reject new company registrations.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only to Admin or Superadmin users.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: Agreement generation is not available for this booking. It must be an approved facility booking.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter custom terms here. These will override the default terms for this specific agreement.
editTermsNote: Changes made here apply only to this agreement. Standard terms will be used if this is left blank.
providerAddressPlaceholder: Address: Oromia Education Training Center, City, Region
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon booking confirmation unless otherwise agreed in writing. Any additional services requested during the event will be billed separately.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the event start date are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations made less than 48 hours prior are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Damages: The Client is responsible for any damages caused to the facility or equipment by their attendees or staff during the rental period. A security deposit may be required.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Conduct: The Client agrees to ensure all attendees conduct themselves in an orderly manner and comply with all facility rules and regulations. The Service Provider reserves the right to remove any individual or terminate the event if conduct is deemed inappropriate or unsafe.
thankYouForBusiness: Thank you for choosing Oromia Education Training Center!
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement generation is not applicable for this type of booking.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: This agreement is not yet ready for viewing by the client or has already been completed.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as the company representative for this booking to view the agreement.
agreementPreparationPending: Agreement is being prepared by admin.
failedToUploadToCloudinary: Failed to upload file to Cloudinary. Please check server logs.
agreementUploadedSuccessfully: Your signed agreement has been successfully uploaded.
errorUploadingAgreementActual: An error occurred while uploading the agreement. Please try again.
yourSignedAgreementUploaded: Your Signed Agreement Has Been Uploaded
pageNotFoundMessage: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist. It might have been moved, deleted, or maybe you mistyped the URL.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your profile details and password.

noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected date range.

adminRegisteredMessage: Admin user {email} has been successfully registered.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only to Superadmin users.

contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help! Reach out to us through any of the channels below.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific inquiries related to dormitory rooms in these buildings:
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, facility bookings, or general information:
addressPlaceholder: Oromia Education Training Center, Main Campus, City, Oromia
mapPlaceholder: Google Maps embed will be here.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Please use the new payment process or navigate to the homepage.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory room more than once for the same start date with the same phone number.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: A required database index for duplicate booking checks is missing. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure you haven't already booked for this date. Contact support to resolve the index issue.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration (Firestore index) is required to check for duplicate bookings. Please contact support to resolve this before booking.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: Used for payment verification via Telegram.
